cli.appDescription: Powerful and flexible task management MCP server
cli.appLongDescription:
Gorev is a modern task management server that provides task management
capabilities to AI assistants via Model Context Protocol (MCP).

üöÄ Compatible with Claude Code, VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf and other MCP-compatible editors
cli.appExamples:
# Start MCP server
  gorev serve

  # Start with English language
  gorev serve --lang=en

  # List templates
  gorev template list

  # Quick task creation
  gorev task quick

  # Run in debug mode
  gorev serve --debug
cli.serveLongDescription:
Starts the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server.
AI assistants connect to this server to access task management tools.

üîß Usage with Claude Code:
  1. Add MCP server configuration to your CLAUDE.md file
  2. Start the server
  3. Use MCP tools from Claude Code
cli.serveExamples:
# Start server (Turkish)
  gorev serve

  # Start with English
  gorev serve --lang=en

  # Start in debug mode
  gorev serve --debug

  # Start in background (Linux/macOS)
  nohup gorev serve > gorev.log 2>&1 &
cli.templateDescription: List and manage templates for creating tasks
cli.ideDescription: Gorev extension installation and management for VS Code, Cursor and Windsurf IDEs
cli.mcpDescription: Test MCP (Model Context Protocol) tools directly from command line.

error.confirmationRequired: 'onay' parameter must be true to delete task
error.editFieldRequired: at least one edit field must be specified (baslik, aciklama, oncelik, proje_id or son_tarih)
error.directTaskCreateDeprecated: gorev_olustur is deprecated. Please use templateden_gorev_olustur tool.
error.invalidDateFormat: invalid due date format (must be YYYY-MM-DD): {{.Error}}
error.taskCannotStart: this task cannot be started, the following tasks must be completed first: {{.Dependencies}}
error.taskCannotComplete: this task cannot be completed, all subtasks must be completed first
error.taskHasSubtasks: this task cannot be deleted, {{.Count}} subtasks must be deleted first
error.subtaskProjectMismatch: subtask and parent task must be in same project
error.noActiveProject: proje_id not specified and no active project set
error.taskCannotStartDependencies: this task cannot be started, the following tasks must be completed first: {{.Dependencies}}
error.taskCannotCompleteSubtasks: this task cannot be completed, all subtasks must be completed first
error.taskHasSubtasksCannotDelete: this task cannot be deleted, {{.Count}} subtasks must be deleted first
error.noActiveProjectSet: No active project has been set yet.
error.editFieldRequiredDetailed: at least one edit field must be specified (baslik, aciklama, oncelik, proje_id or son_tarih)
error.deleteConfirmationRequired: 'onay' parameter must be true to delete task
error.taskIdsArrayRequired: task_ids must be in array format
error.tagsArrayRequired: tags must be in array format
error.invalidFieldValue: invalid value for field '{{.Field}}': '{{.Value}}'. Valid values: {{.ValidValues}}
error.taskMovedToParent: ‚úì Task moved to new parent task
error.activeTaskSetSuccess: ‚úÖ Task {{.TaskID}} successfully set as active task.
error.fileWatcherInitFailed: File watcher system could not be initialized

error.pathSaveFailed: failed to save path to database: {{.Error}}
error.filterProfileNameExists: a profile with this name already exists: {{.Name}}
error.filterProfileUseFailed: failed to mark filter profile as used: {{.Error}}
error.noActionIdentified: no clear action identified in query: {{.Query}}
error.createActionRequiresContent: create action requires task content specification

error.filePathNotFound: file path to remove not found
error.workspaceDbInitFailed: failed to initialize database for workspace {{.Name}}: {{.Error}}

success.taskMovedToParent: ‚úì Task moved to new parent task
success.fileWatchAdded:
‚úÖ File path '{{.FilePath}}' added to watch for task '{{.TaskTitle}}'.

File changes will be automatically tracked and task status will be updated as needed.
success.fileWatchRemoved: ‚úÖ File path '{{.FilePath}}' removed from watch for task ID {{.TaskID}}.
success.searchHistoryCleaned: ‚úÖ {{.Count}} old search records cleaned (older than {{.Days}} days)

messages.dependencyWarning: > ‚ö†Ô∏è **Warning:** This task cannot be started! These tasks must be completed first: {{.Dependencies}}
messages.noTasksInProject: No tasks found in {{.Project}} project yet.
messages.suggestionActionTip: üí° **Tip:** You can directly copy and use the suggested actions.
messages.templateUsageTip: üí° **Usage:** Use `templateden_gorev_olustur` command with template ID and field values.

validation.required_array: {{.Param}} parameter is required and must be array
validation.required_object: {{.Param}} parameter is required and must be an object
validation.one_of_required: at least one of {{.Params}} parameters is required
validation.at_least_one_field: At least one field must be specified: {{.Fields}}

id_descriptions.task_active: Task ID to set as active
id_descriptions.task_hierarchy: Task ID to show hierarchy for
id_descriptions.project_active: Project ID to set as active

task_count.return_max: Maximum number of tasks to return

batch.updates: Update list. Each item should be in {id: string, updates: object} format

descriptions.gorev_olustur: ‚ö†Ô∏è DEPRECATED: This tool has been deprecated since v0.10.0. Please use 'templateden_gorev_olustur' tool.
descriptions.gorev_listele: Lists tasks by filtering and sorting according to criteria such as status, project, due date.
descriptions.gorev_detay: Shows all details of a task in markdown format. Includes information like dependencies, tags, due date.
descriptions.gorev_guncelle: Updates a task's status (beklemede, devam_ediyor, tamamlandi).
descriptions.gorev_duzenle: Edits a task's properties like title, description, priority.
descriptions.gorev_sil: Permanently deletes a task. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone!
descriptions.proje_listele: Lists all projects with task counts.
descriptions.proje_gorevleri: Shows tasks belonging to specified project organized by status groups.
descriptions.aktif_proje: Manage active project (actions: set|get|clear). Set active project for new tasks, get current active project, or clear active project setting.
descriptions.aktif_proje_ayarla: Sets the active project to work on. New tasks will be automatically assigned to this project.
descriptions.aktif_proje_kaldir: Removes the active project setting. No project will be active anymore.
descriptions.template_listele: Lists available task templates. Templates are used for consistent task creation.
descriptions.templateden_gorev_olustur: Creates a new task using the specified template. This is the ONLY way to create tasks in v0.10.0+.
descriptions.gorev_set_active: Sets active task for AI session and automatically changes its status to 'devam_ediyor'.
descriptions.gorev_get_active: Returns the currently active task for AI session.
descriptions.gorev_context_summary: AI-optimized context summary. Shows active task, recent tasks, priorities and blockers.
descriptions.gorev_batch_update: Updates multiple tasks at once. Used for efficient bulk operations.
descriptions.gorev_nlp_query: Natural language task search. Examples: 'high priority', 'working on today', 'tag:bug'
descriptions.gorev_search_advanced: Advanced search - FTS5 full-text search, fuzzy matching, and filters
descriptions.gorev_filter_profile: Manage filter profiles (actions: save|load|list|delete). Save filter profiles for future use, load saved profiles, list all profiles, or delete a profile.
descriptions.gorev_filter_profile_save: Save filter profile - store search and filter settings for future use
descriptions.gorev_filter_profile_load: Load filter profile - apply saved search and filter settings
descriptions.gorev_filter_profile_list: List filter profiles - show all saved search profiles
descriptions.gorev_filter_profile_delete: Delete filter profile - permanently remove saved profile
descriptions.gorev_search: Search tasks using various methods (modes: nlp|advanced|history). Natural language query, advanced FTS5 search, or search history.
descriptions.gorev_search_history: Search history - show recent searches and their results
descriptions.gorev_file_watch_add: Adds a file path to a task and starts monitoring for automatic status updates.
descriptions.gorev_file_watch_remove: Removes a file path from a task and stops monitoring.
descriptions.gorev_file_watch_list: Lists monitored file paths for a task.
descriptions.gorev_altgorev_olustur: Creates a subtask under an existing task. Subtask inherits the parent's project.
descriptions.gorev_ust_degistir: Changes a task's parent or moves to root level.
descriptions.gorev_hiyerarsi_goster: Shows a task's complete hierarchy. Displays parent tasks, subtasks and siblings in full tree structure.
descriptions.gorev_bagimlilik_ekle: Creates a dependency relationship between two tasks.
descriptions.ozet_goster: Summary report showing system status. Includes total task counts, project statistics, priority distributions and recent activities.
descriptions.gorev_export: Export tasks, projects and related data to file in JSON or CSV format. Used for backup and data sharing.
descriptions.gorev_import: Import previously exported data back into the system. Offers conflict resolution and selective import options.
descriptions.gorev_ide: Manage IDE extensions (actions: detect|install|uninstall|status|update). Detect installed IDEs, install Gorev extension, uninstall extension, check status, or update to latest version.
descriptions.ide_detect: Detect IDEs on the system (VS Code, Cursor, Windsurf)
descriptions.ide_install: Install Gorev extension to specified IDE
descriptions.ide_uninstall: Remove Gorev extension from specified IDE
descriptions.ide_status: Check extension installation status in IDEs
descriptions.ide_update: Update Gorev extension to latest version
descriptions.gorev_bulk: Perform bulk operations on tasks (operations: transition|tag|update). Update status for multiple tasks, add/remove tags, or update multiple task properties at once.
descriptions.gorev_hierarchy: Manage task hierarchy (actions: create_subtask|change_parent|show). Create subtask under parent, change task's parent, or show full task hierarchy tree.
descriptions.gorev_context: Manage AI context (actions: set_active|get_active|recent|summary). Set active task for AI session, get current active task, view recent tasks, or get AI context summary.

descriptions.task_id: Task ID to set as active
descriptions.yeni_parent_id: New parent task ID. Leave empty to move to root level
descriptions.kaynak_id: Dependent task ID (the one that will wait)
descriptions.hedef_id: Dependency target ID (must be completed first)
descriptions.onay: Must be true to confirm deletion
descriptions.durum_filter: Task status to filter (beklemede, devam_ediyor, tamamlandi)
descriptions.filtre: Special filter type (acil: due within 7 days, gecmis: overdue)
descriptions.tum_projeler: If true, show tasks from all projects, if false only from active project
descriptions.limit: Maximum number of tasks to return (default: 50, max: 200)
descriptions.offset: Number of tasks to skip for pagination (default: 0)

export.output_path: Path where the exported file will be saved

import.file_path: Path to the file to import
import.import_mode: Import mode (merge: add to existing, replace: replace all)
import.conflict_resolution: Conflict resolution (skip: skip, overwrite: overwrite, prompt: ask)
import.dry_run: Only analyze, don't make changes (default: false)

ide.ide_type: IDE type (vscode, cursor, windsurf or all for all)

ide.downloadFailedStatus: download failed with HTTP status code: {{.Status}}
ide.githubApiFailed: GitHub API request failed with HTTP status code: {{.Status}}
ide.noVsixAsset: no VSIX asset found in release

export.generatedDescription: Automatic export generated by Gorev MCP Server
